title: Lunar Revel Nidalee Wallpaper- League Icon Removed and Fixed up

embed.description: Hey reddit this is my first time posting something like this. I recently was browsing surrender@20 and saw links for 4k Lunar revel wallpapers....

body:
Edited to removed league icon via heavy redraws, retouched the Lunar Revel high resolution wallpapers. Fixed some errors that looked funky on an actual 4k monitor because it seems the artist rushed some parts. Currently there is Katarina  and Nidalee  done, Jinx up next just taking awhile due to the particle effects used in the image.

If there are some other league or other wallpapers with an logo, marring its wallpaper-iness? then pm me or mention it here probs will do it if its a nice one.

*The link to imgur is [here](http://imgur.com/a/92k2k)*

Enjoy the clean high resolution wallpapers :P  {{summoner:1}} 
-Xamanthas/Helmet Bro

replies.body: why not just link the photos here directly. I'd download the kat one but I'm not going to leddit.

haha xD because i wanted to save myself the trouble but here we go mate, ill also add it in to the article

[Imgur](http://imgur.com/a/92k2k)
